column1: For greater detail for the years 2000-2011 see Table TSGB0403
1  Discontinuities in the series (denoted by lines) are described in detail in the Notes and Definitions.
2  Statistics for all goods vehicles, including those under 3.5 tonnes gross vehicle weight.
3  Figures for rail are for financial years (e.g. 2011 will be 2011/12).
4  Road freight figures are not available for 2011
The rail figures in this table are outside the scope of National Statistics
